readme:
# Zendesk Support Ticket Assistant

This application helps support agents by automatically suggesting answers to open tickets based on previously resolved tickets using RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) technology.

[Link to project](https://enlightby.ai/#/projects/10)  
[Install Enlighter extention](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ai-dl.enlighter)  
[Join Discord Server](https://discord.gg/VfAzUvUxRM)

## Features

- Downloads resolved ticket descriptions from Zendesk API
- Builds a RAG database from previous Q&A pairs
- Processes open tickets and suggests answers
- Posts suggested answers as non-public comments
- Includes an interactive testing mode

## Setup

1. Make sure you have Python installed on your system

2. Install the required packages:
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

3. Run the application:
```bash
python main.py
```

## How it Works

1. The app first downloads all resolved tickets from Zendesk
2. It extracts Q&A pairs from the tickets where answers were provided by support agents
3. These Q&A pairs are used to build a RAG database using FAISS and HuggingFace embeddings
4. The app then processes all open tickets:
   - Retrieves similar past Q&A pairs
   - Generates appropriate answers
   - Posts the answers as non-public comments
5. Finally, it enters an interactive testing mode where you can try out different questions

## Testing

After processing all tickets, the application enters a testing mode where you can:
1. Enter any support-related question
2. Get AI-generated answers based on previous support interactions
3. Type 'quit' to exit the testing mode
